title: Edurkuga
description: The dais of the Igīgū gods, Edurkuga (“House, Pure Abode”), was located in the TE.E (read as either Tê or Kisīri) district of Babylon, in the eastern half of the inner city. According to the Babylonian topographical text Tintir = Babylon Tablet IV, it was one of two daises in that part of Babylon.
